title: Dr. Babar Awan, Sheikh Rashid, Ahmad Yar Hiraj separately call on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 19 (APP):Leader of Pakistan Tehrik-e-Insaf and former Law Minister Dr. Babar Awan called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Thursday.
During the meeting, the Prime Minister offered Fateha and prayed for the soul
of late Mohtarma Zaib-un-Nisa Begum, mother Dr. Babar Awan.
Minister for Railways Sheikh Rashid Ahmad and Chairman Prime Ministerâ€™s
Inspection Commission Ahmad Yar Hiraj also separately called on the Prime
Minister.
